actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the establishment of, and the deduction of contributions to, home ownership plans.

summary.text: Home Ownership Plan Encouragement Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals a tax deduction for amounts paid to a home ownership plan for the purchase of a first home. Limits the duration of such deduction to five years. Provides for the imposition of an excise tax on excess contributions to such plan. Requires a penalty payment for failure to provide timely reports on such plan.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the establishment of, and the deduction of contributions to, home ownership plans.
